basics.name: Mikel Ishihara
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2021.

project experience.summary: Create a digitized check-in process for Animal Quarantine Facility
highlights: Collaborated with fellow interns to design a solution for the Animal Quarantine Facility at HNL
Design a database and develop a Model-View-Controller using C#
Create a web application using Angular framework and HTML/CSS for both iPad and desktop

project experience.summary: Create a PCB-based weather measurement device
highlights: Design a custom PCB board using AutoDesk Eagle software
Use completed PCB board and sensors to assemble a weather measurement device
Utilize data from weather device to determeint the most efficient locations to place solar panels at UH Manoa campus

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
